name: bj-ceqsalg

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w1), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))

-| wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0)), w1))

body.origin:

-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Remove from ~ ceqsalg dependency on ~ ax-ext (and on ~ df-cleq and ~ df-v ). See also ~ bj-ceqsalgv . (Contributed by BJ, 12-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
